title.rendered: 800 euros for a game that nobody should buy is the sad end of Minecraft: Story Mode

content.rendered:
So if you thought “Yes, I would gladly spend 100 euros for a 2-3 hour Minecraft Story Mode episode”, then no: don’t do it. Although you can As such, it’s your very last chance to buy the game for your Xbox 360.

Version:1

Languages: English

Release: 12/31/2015

Platforms: Windows PC, Playstation 3, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Windows, Playstation Vita, PlayStation 4

Minecraft: Story Mode is about to end, the digital plug is supposed to be on June 25, 2019 be finally drawn. After that day, the game will disappear from all stores; in many, however, it is already gone. That was it for the Xbox 360 store until it was for 99.99 euros per episode suddenly resurrected. Yep, zombie minecraft story mode is so expensive with 8 episodes will a half decent laptop. And if you haven’t already come up with the idea yourself: Please don’t buy it, because you shouldn’t either – says the publisher.

Now there’s even a halfway good reason for this: players had bought Minecraft: Story Mode in advance, but not downloaded the episodes. But if the game is not offered at all, nobody can download it. So what to do? As it seems, the Xbox 360 store offered only one solution: the game needs to crawl back into the store, but so that no one grabs it, it now costs 800 euros for the entire package:

“In the process of removing these items for sale, on the Xbox 360 platform only, existing Minecraft: Story Mode players became unable to download their remaining episodes. From working with the Xbox 360 platform, the only solution to this situation is to re-list the downloadable content for purchase. So, to assist existing customers, all the downloadable Episodes for the two Minecraft: Story Mode titles are temporarily re-listed but, to deter new purchases, they will be re-listed at a very high price!”

Start picture series(23 pictures)

Telltale Games: All games at a glance!

If you buy the game as a joke, you’ll have to pay almost 100 euros per episode – so keep your hands off. (Unless you really really want Minecraft: Story Mode for your Xbox 360. Absolutely.)

Minecraft: Story Mode may go down the hunting grounds, but the Mojang adventure Minecraft: Dungeons was only recently announced. Show:

Perhaps it would have been more customer-friendly to include the reason for the usury in the description of the game. Just in case someone overlooks the $99.99 – and accidentally clicks buy. Ouch. Incidentally, the usury price and the game will also disappear from the Xbox 360 store from June 25, 2019; if you have purchased the episodes but not downloaded them yet, you should do so soon.
